summary: Comprehensive testing of 'Mis Órdenes' (My Orders) functionality completed successfully. All backend API endpoints and frontend UI components are working correctly according to specifications.
passed_tests: Backend API - /api/my-orders endpoint returns correctly structured data
Backend API - Orders organized by type (preventivo/correctivo) and status
Backend API - Summary counters calculated correctly
Backend API - Recurrence functionality creates next order with same technician
Backend API - Technician user authentication and authorization working
Frontend UI - 'Mis Órdenes' page loads and displays correctly
Frontend UI - Page title shows 'Mis Órdenes' with user context
Frontend UI - Summary cards display all 4 counters (Preventivas/Correctivas Pendientes/Completadas)
Frontend UI - Tabs for Preventivas and Correctivas with correct counts
Frontend UI - Organization by status: Pendientes/En Progreso vs Completadas sections
Frontend UI - Order cards display with proper information (title, machine, department, priority, status)
Frontend UI - Order card navigation to detail page works correctly
Frontend UI - 'Mis Órdenes' link appears in sidebar with proper highlighting
Frontend UI - Tab switching between Preventivas and Correctivas works
Frontend UI - Navigation between pages maintains proper state
Integration - Backend data correctly displayed in frontend UI
Integration - Authentication flow works for technician role
Integration - Real-time data synchronization between backend and frontend

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All My Orders API endpoints working perfectly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - My Orders page UI and navigation working correctly
